affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 头脑, 智力, 思考(=mind)

bilingual.source: The basement is below the ground floor.

bilingual.target: 地下室感觉潮湿而且有霉味。

bilingual.source: The laundry room is located in the basement.

bilingual.target: 地下室感觉无光的且寒冷。

bilingual.source: He built a studio in the basement.
bilingual.target: 他在地下室里建了一个工作室。

bilingual.source: Use a machine to dehumidify the basement.
bilingual.target: 使用机器来除湿地下室。

bilingual.source: There is a small gym in the basement.
bilingual.target: 地下室里有一个小型健身房。

list.abstract: n.【建筑学】（全部或部分在地下的）地下室（墙或建筑物的）基底，底部，墙脚，墙根（柱子的）基部，柱础（古典或文艺复兴时期建筑物）底层的内部（或正面）=basementcomplex[美国方言]（尤指学校室内）厕所，盥洗室

yingyinNormal.en: Let's get this over with. I have a lot of other places I need to be. Like your mom's basement?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那咱开始吧，我有很多地方得去。像你妈家的地下室。

yingyinNormal.en: Where is it? Is it in the basement? Is there a downstairs? Maybe it's in the rec room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她在哪儿？在地下室吗？这里有没有地下一层 ？没准她在娱乐室玩呢。

yingyinNormal.en: There were armed men in the basement of the exchange, a massive firefight six stories underground. Sameen was shot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 交易所的地下室设有重兵，负六层一场激战，萨姆恩中弹。

yingyinNormal.en: I had to go all the way to the basement because some idiot keeps stuffing the trash chute with pizza boxes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不得不跑去地下室扔，某个白痴小孩老是用披萨盒把垃圾槽堵住。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, great. Also, we were kind of hoping that Dylan could stay in the basement with me for a little while.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太好了，同时，我们还有点希望能让迪兰跟我在地下室里小住一段时间。

yingyinNormal.en: I know how to deal with stubborn children. My mother used to run an illegal day care center in our basement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道怎么对付不听话的小孩，我妈以前在我家地下室办了个非法日托班。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen, I was talking to Haley and Dylan. They want to know if he can stay in the basement for a few weeks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是这样，我刚刚在跟海莉和迪兰聊，他们想问问迪兰可不可以在地下室住几个星期。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Leonard. Guess who's back! Dr. Lorvis! Yeah. You care to join us? What? You locked them in your basement?
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，猜猜谁回来了，乐维斯医生！哦，你想和我们一起玩吗？什么？你把他们锁在你的地下室里了？！

yingyinNormal.en: Unlike you, I don't have a rich husband. What I do have is a reputation for being a screw-up who never follows through on anything, which is why, in case you haven't noticed, I'm in my third year of a two-year college program and still living in my parent basement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 跟你不同，我没有有钱的老公，大家都觉得我什么事都会搞砸，什么事都坚持不下去，这就是为什么 如果你没留意到的话，两年的大学我已经读了第三年了，而且还住在父母的地下室里。

yingyinNormal.en: But if she crosses Blair Waldorf, it's straight back to the basement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是如果和布莱尔·霍道夫对着干，她只会直直的跌入低谷。

yingyinNormal.en: Penny, your nails look great. Oh, thanks. I found this place in Alhambra. It's in a woman's basement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩妮，你的指甲好漂亮。谢谢，我是在阿罕布拉宫找到这地方的，是在一个女士地下廉价商场里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A man described as a "non-worker civilian" was buried up to his waist in the <highlight>basement</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据悉，一名“非工人”男子在地下室被废墟埋至腰部。

examination_example.sentence: A rescue worker got trapped in the <highlight>basement</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一名救援人员被困在地下室。
